PHRASE.LANG: Watch all the trailers to get access to the VIP area where you can see exclusive PlayStation® interviews and videos from E3™ 2010
Regardez toutes les bandes-annonces pour débloquer l'accès à la zone VIP où vous pourrez voir des interviews PlayStation® exclusives et des vidéos de l'E3™ 2010.
Sehen Sie sich alle Trailer an, um Zugang zum VIP-Bereich zu erhalten, wo Sie exklusive PlayStation®-Interviews und Videos von der E3™ 2010 ansehen können.
Guarda tutti i trailer per aver accesso all'area VIP, dove puoi guardare interviste PlayStation® esclusive e video dell'E3™ 2010
Ve todos los avances para tener acceso a la zona VIP, donde podrás ver entrevistas exclusivas de PlayStation® y vídeos del E3™ 2010
Only VIPS can access this area.
모든 예고편을 시청하시고 VIP 구역 입장권을 획득하십시오. VIP 구역에서는 한정으로 제공되는 E3™ 2010 PlayStation® 인터뷰와 동영상을 시청할 수 있습니다!
Watch all the trailers to get access to the VIP area where you can see exclusive PlayStation® interviews and videos from E3™ 2010
